title: Riot ping problems
body:
Hi guys, I need help.
I played a normal game in the morning....had 27ms
Then I played ranked game and I had 90---300 ping.....It was jumping up and down every second.....
If u know anythink about it please help.

replies.body: This sudden ping sounds like some pretty serious lag spike with the game server.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) so we can get an overview of your issue to see what's happening.  Let me know what you find!
